bibl.title: Dispatch from John G. Willis to William H. Seward
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

opener.dateline:
United States Commercial Agency
St Paul Loanda Octo 28 1864

div1.p:
Sir
I have the honor to enclose the Returns from this Agency for the Quarter ending September 30 1864.
Agreeably to your Instructions of May 14 I have delivered to Mr A A Silva the property appertaining to the State Department as per the enclosed receipt.

closer.signed:
John G Willis
late Acting U S Com Agent

opener.dateline:
United States Commercial Agency
St Paul Loanda Octo 5 1864

div1.p: We certify that the services of John G Willis late acting Com Agent ceased on the 30 day of September & that he is entitled to his Salary including said day: & that the service of Aug Archer Silva commenced the day following he having received the archives as specified on the 79th Sec. of the General Instructions.
